name: Fred Agency
description:
FRED. Is a boutique agency headquartered in Atlanta specializing in new media, brand strategy, marketing and award-winning design.Â 
Fred and the team at FRED. are largely responsible for the unique creative style that started in the hot South Florida condo market and spread north influencing developers and agencies alike throughout the region. FRED. continues to innovate, set trends and provide fresh, memorable campaigns that consistently drive highly targeted results.
